title: I can't open it
body:
when I log in, it sometimes shows "The server is currently busy. Try again later or check the server status"
I can't even close the window. I have to do "Ctrl+Alt+del"
and then I can't launch almost for an hour.
I only see the logo on my screen and then nothing happens 
sometimes, It DC when I pick my champions.
It just nothing happens after count down.
I have to do "Ctrl+Alt+del" again and then back to the loop.
and then I AKF at the games
I also tried re-installed and installed on a different driver, but I still have the same problem

replies.body:
Hmmmm sounds like there might be a couple different issues going on here. I'm going to tackle them each on their own, but do make sure to go through both steps!

When you can't close the window and have to force close it, there might be some damaged game files that are causing the client to freeze up like that. Try running a repair through the client options, and that should smooth out those freezes.

Anytime you disconnect from champion select it can be a sign that your network lost its link with our game servers for some reason. It doesn't mean your internet is bad or to blame, but the internet is certainly a fickle mistress sometimes. Check up on your network settings using the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), and test the changes in a custom game.
I did repair and re-installed and I also did "connection guide" thing, but I still have the problem

Our tech guys might be able to better see what the main problem is if they're able to see some of those network logs from a game that disconnected. Reach out to them in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and make sure to use our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to generate those network logs.

I did repair and re-installed , but I still have the same problem.
In addition, I'm not only DC during champion select, I also DC when I log in.
I also can't close the window when I disconnect.
and the worst part is I can't reopen the game when I do "Ctrl+Alt+del"
